Articles.Content: I'm trying to make more realistic models for the stock resource scanners. I am envisioning a SMAP-like radar antenna for the big scanner, and a Landsat-esque camera for the small scanner. I'm looking for people who are far less N00by than I am with modeling and animating to help me. Any takers? Danny2462? Xacktar?
Mod requests have their place in General Add-on Affairs
